machine_extruder_start_code.default_value:
;start T0

M104 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0}; set extruder temp
G1 X-15 F7000 ; go to wipe position
M109 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0}; wait for temp

;purge filament
G1 E26
G1 E-16 F1200
G92 E0
G1 X-5 F5000
G1 X-15 F5000

machine_extruder_end_code.default_value:
G1 X-10 F7000 ; go to wipe position
M104 S{material_standby_temperature}; set extruder temp
M109 S{material_standby_temperature}; wait for temp

;end T0
